code: import React from'react';import"./courses.css";import{online}from"../../dummydata";import Title from'../common/title/Title';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OnlineCourses=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"online",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{subtitle:"COURSES",title:"Browse Our Online Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content grid3",children:online.map(val=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"img",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:val.cover}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:val.hoverCover,alt:"",className:"show"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:val.courseName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:val.course})]}))})]})})});};export default OnlineCourses;

sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "./courses.css" import { online } from "../../dummydata" import Title from '../common/title/Title' const OnlineCourses = () => { return (
<div className='content grid3'> {online.map((val) => ( <div className='box'> <div className='img'> <img src={val.cover} /> <img src={val.hoverCover} alt='' className='show' /> </div> <h1>{val.courseName}</h1> <span>{val.course}</span> </div> ))} </div> </div> </section> </div> ) } export default OnlineCourses
